sense.def:
To envy someone
pomeni želeti si, da bi imeli iste stvari ali lastnosti kot nekdo drug.

seg.quote: It would be unfair to envy him his good fortune.

sense.def:
Envy
je čustvo, ki ga občutimo, kadar si želimo, da bi imeli isto stvar ali lastnost kot nekdo drug.

seg.quote: Her undisputed good looks caused envy and admiration.

sense.def:
Če imamo nekaj, kar si želijo drugi, lahko rečemo, da je to
the envy of other people.

seg.quote: It has a robust economy that is the envy of its neighbours.
